sections.heading: by the court; provisions for jury trials applicable
sections.text: The provisions of this Chapter respecting trials by jury, apply, so far as they are in their nature applicable, to trials by the court.SourceR.S.1867, Code § 320, p. 448;R.S.1913, § 7866;C.S.1922, § 8811;C.S.1929, § 20-1128;R.S.1943, § 25-1128.Anno
